name: Chromanoids
overview: Chromanoids is a colorful maze and chase game, with 28 levels (divided into 4 worlds), 6 types of enemies, and 4 different melodies. In each level you must eliminate a certain number of aliens by matching Oozi's color with the color of his enemies. In most levels a red chili will appear, when Oozi devours it, it will turn into fire and will be able to eliminate any enemy regardless of its color.
